name: Star vs Skull
description:
this game is very simple you should Move the yellow star to the finish line, which is a yellow down arrow, but do not hit the skulls.

Do not worry when the game gets on your nerves !!!!

The threat to life in the game is unlimited and you will automatically start the game from the same stage after hitting the skulls.

for move the star use arrow kes or "A"S"W"D

The number of stages of the game is 16. the game have no sound or music  This game is in development.

I hope you enjoy this game.
